data.title: Music and Voice Lessons in Bedford — Bedford Music Co
data.meta_description: Our expert teachers offer tuition from beginner to advanced students on a wide variety of instruments including brass, woodwind, rock and pop and voice.
data.text:
Sign up for lessons here

Application for lessons

Please complete and submit for lessons. You will receive an automatic email saying we have received your form. You will be placed on a waiting list and when a teacher has identified a time and space for the lesson, they will contact you. Once the lesson is set up you will be asked to complete a Direct Debit mandate and once payment is taken, the lessons will start. Parents and students in receipt of Pupil Premium may receive a 50% remission of lesson costs (up to 20 minute individual). If applicable, there is a question below, and we will forward you the request form. (This must be completed, returned and confirmed before discount can be applied).

Name of pupil *

Address *

What is your child's preferred gender *

Female

Male

Prefer not to say

Not known

How best describes your childs ethnicity *

White/White British

Mixed Background

Asian/Asian British

Black/Black British

Any other ethnic groups

Prefer not to say

Not known

Email *

This will be used for communication and invoicing

Email

Please complete if a different email is used for invoicing

Phone number *

Mobile number

School *

Current year group *

Choice of Instrument to be learnt *

Is your child Primary or Secondary School age? *

Lesson type *

Please note, the final decision on group size rests with the teacher, as they will know other pupils available for the group and the relevant standard of each pupil.

Does your child have a special educational need *

Is there anything you wish the teacher to be aware of *

Are you in receipt of Pupil Premium? *

If your child is eligible for Pupil Premium you can apply for 50% discount. You will be sent a remission form to complete

Data Protection *

Please read on our website parents page. I give permission for occasional photos of my child to be taken, stored by Bedford Music Co-operative and used for marketing purposes

I have read the terms and conditions *

Performance. (Fiddle Fiesta, Band Bonanza etc.) *

We now have to submit the name of every pupil taking part in every performance, to the Borough each time. Please may we have your permission to send this to the Borough for any performance we organise, in which your child takes part?

Name of parent / Carer *

Thank you for your lesson application. We can confirm that we have received your form and that you will now be placed on a waiting list. When a teacher has identified a time and space for the lesson, they will contact you. Once the lesson is set up you will be asked to complete a Direct Debit mandate and once payment is taken, the lessons will start.

If you can already play an instrument, find out more about our ensembles and sign up here.

Parents and students in receipt of Pupil Premium may receive a 50% remission of lesson costs. If applicable, please also fill out an application form for remissions by clicking here.

Parents and students of a LAC child may receive 100% of lesson costs. If applicable, please also fill out an application form for remissions by clicking here.

Instrumental and vocal lessons

What we offer:

Brass

Baritone

Cornet

Euphonium

French Horn

Tenor Horn

Trombone

Trumpet

Tuba​

Bassoon

Clarinet

Fife

Flute

Saxophone

Strings

Viola

Violin

Rock and Pop

Electric and Acoustic Guitar

Electric Bass Guitar

Keyboard

Piano

Ukulele

Classical and contemporary

Guitar

Keyboard

Percussion

Piano

Voice

DJ ing

DJing is a fun and exciting way to use way to develop your understanding of digital music, using turntablism and electronica as musical instruments. Learning how to use DJ software, mix tracks, beat match, scratch, sample, use special effects and edit music.

Academic Studies and Accompaniment

Aural Skills

GCSE and A Level Tutoring

Music Theory

Piano Accompaniment

If you can't find the instrument you are looking for, please contact us at office@bedsmusic.coop as we are always expanding our teaching specialists and may just have someone available to teach that instrument.
